records.context_note: A fast boat with 14 POB was rescued by ESP/GC/OPV. Initially, 1 deceased and 3 injured were found. One of the injured persons later died in the hospital, bringing the total dead to 2 and injured to 2. The incident is under judiciary proceeding.
records.evidence_quote: fast boat rescued with 14 POB within them 2 injured and 2 corpse

records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources member was hospitalized in Chios, Greece, due to an internal blood swelling from a broken rib sustained weeks prior. The incident occurred off duty. The individual underwent surgery and was later transferred to Stockholm for recovery. Operational activities were not affected.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Human Resources was hospitalised in Chios hospital, Greece.

records.context_note: A rubber boat with approximately 50 migrants was detected by Frontex assets inside Turkish Territorial Waters. Two TCG patrol boats escorted the rubber boat and executed dangerous manoeuvres close to HCG assets. The incident raised serious safety and security concerns due to TCG's hostile behaviour.
records.evidence_quote: TCG vessels executed dangerous manoeuvres towards Text Removed - Reporting Tools assets

records.location_text_raw: Text Removed - Operational Area, Evros, Greece
records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources member tested positive for COVID-19 at a Health Center in Evros, Greece. The individual had contact with other personnel who had previously tested positive. The infected person and close contacts were isolated, and subsequent tests confirmed recovery.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Human Resources was tested COVID 19 at Health Center Text Removed - Operational Area, result positive.

records.context_note: A LVA CPB (Coastal Patrol Boat) collided with an unmarked underwater object (possible rock) during a mission, damaging its engines and gearboxes. No crew members were injured. The CPB was out of order for an indefinite time, requiring a gearbox replacement. The vessel was back to full operational capacity by 10.05.2021.
records.evidence_quote: happened collision with unmarked underwater object (possible rock), during collision was damaged all engines gearboxes.

records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources member deployed in Vilnius, Lithuania, tested positive for COVID-19 after contact with another infected colleague. The individual self-isolated at their apartment, showing light symptoms. A second test was planned after the isolation period.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Human Resources deployed at Text Removed - Operational Area performed a COVID 19 test because during the last working shift he was in contact with Text Removed - Human Resources who after work was positively tested for Covid.

records.uncertainty_note: Exact location within Chios sea area removed.
records.context_note: A TCG patrol boat entered Hellenic Territorial Waters near Chios, Greece, and executed dangerous manoeuvres towards a Swedish CPB (Coastal Patrol Boat). The Swedish CPB maneuvered to avoid collision, and the TCG vessel eventually turned back. The incident raised safety concerns and violated HTW.
records.evidence_quote: Incident between FX SWE CPB and TCG patrol boat - Dangerous manoeuvre within Greek territorial waters

records.uncertainty_note: Exact location within Chios sea area removed.
records.context_note: A TCG patrol boat entered Greek Territorial Waters near Chios, Greece, at high speed, turned off its navigation lights, and took a collision course towards a Finnish CPB (Coastal Patrol Boat), passing within 10 meters. The situation was deemed very dangerous and a violation of international navigation rules.
records.evidence_quote: Incident between FX FIN CPB and TCG patrol boat- Dangerous manoeuvre within Greek territorial waters

records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources member deployed in Bulgaria tested positive for COVID-19. The individual was isolated for 14 days in accommodation and received support. Close contacts were identified, and follow-up tests were planned. The quarantine ended on 08.05.2021, and the individual resumed regular shifts.
records.evidence_quote: The Text Removed - Human Resources deployed to JO FP Land in Text Removed - Operational Area (Bulgaria) in the JO Focal Points Land 2021 took a PCR test on 25.04.2021. The test result on 26.04.2021 is positive.

records.location_text_raw: Text Removed - Operational Area, Evros, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Location of incident field states 'Evros, Greece', but the narrative indicates the incident (testing positive and self-isolation) occurred 'at home in Bulgaria'.
records.context_note: A Frontex Human Resources member deployed in Evros, Greece, felt COVID-19 symptoms at home in Bulgaria and tested positive. The individual self-isolated at their family home in Bulgaria and underwent a 14-day quarantine. No close contacts among colleagues were identified.
records.evidence_quote: she performed a COVID-19 rapid test due to the fact that she felt all typical symptoms when at home in Bulgaria. She received the results and she was found 'POSITIVE' to the virus.

records.context_note: A car crashed into the back of another vehicle at a vehicle check point in Albania. The driver and passenger of the crashed car were taken to the hospital due to shock. No Frontex personnel were injured, and no Frontex equipment was damaged. The accident was attributed to inadequate speed and driver inattention.
records.evidence_quote: one car coming from Text Removed - Operational Area approached the check point and crashed in the back side of another vehicle
